name: Wildlife Park
description: Build and manage your own wildlife compound, determine which animals to feature, how to manage the business while ensuring that all the animals are thriving. • Build a giant animal park from scratch and manage it well • Choose a variety of terrains with different climates and environmental sounds • 45 detailed, seamlessly animated and...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8/7 Processor: x86 Memory: 256 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Not much to say, and old Game, which can be still enjoyed :) Build your own Park and keep your Customers and Animals happy.  Graphic: 5/10  Gameplay: 8/10  Didnt really know what to say about this Game xD
Repetitive. Out of date. Clunky graphics. Difficult and confusing interface.  4 / 10.
